meanings.definition: A place where baked goods are sold.
meanings.sent1: I bought a delicious cake from the bakeshop.
meanings.sent2: The bakeshop on the corner always smells amazing.
meanings.sent3: The bakeshop had a sale, so I bought enough cookies to last a year!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm and inviting as a bakeshop on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The bakeshop displayed a rainbow of colorful cupcakes in the window.

meanings.definition: To visit or work at a bakeshop.
meanings.sent1: I love to bakeshop on weekends for fun.
meanings.sent2: She decided to bakeshop at the new bakery in town.
meanings.sent3: When I'm stressed, I like to bakeshop to relax.
meanings.sent4: His mind would often bakeshop to memories of baking with his grandmother.
meanings.sent5: The chef's hands moved with precision as he bakeshopped in the kitchen.
